USER: Alexa, open home remedies

ALEXA: Welcome to Home Remedies, Here you can search for any home remedies for your health problem, I will also describe your problem in brief so that you will understand better

USER: remedy for low back pain

ALEXA: Back pain or Low back pain(LBP) is one of the most common health conditions that affects an individual multiple times in his or her lifetime. As a person ages, it becomes recurrent. According to medlineplus, out of 10, an estimated 8 individuals suffer from back pain. The global cost linked with back pain treatment exceeds $25 billion every year. Back pain should never be taken lightly. Most back pains fade away within a month but if it lasts for three months or more, it is chronic and requires proper medical care. Here is the remedy for back pain. Step 1: Boil 10 to 12 fresh basil leaves in a cup of water for 10 minutes. Step 2: Once it boils down to half the quantity, allow the mixture to warm. Step 3: Strain and add a pinch of salt. Drink twice a day if you have mild back pain. Get well soon. You can say "help" or choose another problem.
